title: OpenAI Funding Questions Put Stress on Stock Market’s AI Rally
description: The stock market’s euphoria toward artificial intelligence has quickly been overtaken by a bout of skepticism, triggering a steep selloff in megacap technology companies that have led this year’s rally.
content:

title: As Russian drone incursions rattle Europe, Poland and Romania deploy new defensive system
description: WARSHAW, Nov 6: Poland and Romania are deploying a new weapons system to defend against Russian drones, following a spate of incursions into NATO airspace in recent months that exposed the alliance’s vulnerabilities and put Europe on edge. The American Merops system, which is small enough to fit in the back of a midsized pickup truck, can identify drones and close in on them, using artificial intelligence to navigate when satellite and electronic communications are jammed. As well as being […]

title: AI speech tools could revolutionize dental record-keeping-but caution is needed
description: A new study from King's College London has revealed that artificial intelligence (AI) automatic speech recognition (ASR) tools could dramatically improve how dental professionals record patient information—saving time and reducing administrative burden.

title: Investors back $1.5 trillion pay offer for Musk
description: Elon Musk has the chance to earn up to $US1 trillion ($1.5 trillion) if he can successfully pivot the EV maker to robotics and artificial intelligence.
content: Washington | Tesla shareholders have backed the largest ever pay plan for an executive, offering controversial billionaire Elon Musk the chance to earn up to $1 trillion ($1.5 trillion) if he can successfully pivot the electric vehicle maker to robot... [255 chars]

title: New Coca-Cola Holiday Ad Creator Defends AI Use, 'Human Artistry'
description: Similar to last year's "holidays are coming" spot, Coke's commercial this season is also heavy on artificial intelligence.
content:

title: Eyes turn to space to feed power-hungry data centers
description: Tech firms are floating the idea of building data centers in space and tapping into the sun's energy to meet out-of-this-world power demands in a fierce artificial intelligence race. title: Number of Billion Dollar US IPOs Falls Far Behind Private Rounds
description: Private companies are raising funds from investors in multibillion-dollar rounds at a quicker pace than those opting for similarly sized US IPOs, as public markets struggle to attract fast-growing artificial intelligence startups and aspiring-tech giants.

title: Michigan AG seeks to pump the brakes on review of DTE data center deal
description: Attorney General Dana Nessel says DTE's request to approve a megadeal to serve an artificial intelligence data center shouldn't go ahead without a public hearing and outside scrutiny.
content:
LANSING, MI - Michigan Attorney General Dana Nessel is opposing utility DTE Energy’s request to rush consideration of a deal to serve a massive data center for ChatGPT creator Open AI and other tech partners.

title: VEON’s Beeline Kazakhstan Partners with Starlink Direct to Cell to Launch Satellite Connectivity to Kazakhstan, with Support from Kazakhstan Ministry of Artificial Intelligence and Digital Development
